attributes.action: Disband the Royal Mail and stop all the strike action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As employees are asking for pay rises for a national service that simply is not meeting the high standards that british public expect from a public organisation. The royal mail as a whole appears to be failing from all perspectives as the services that are meant to be kept to are not. I put it to Mr Brown to put our failing postal service out for tender and restore faith in a national postal service.
